definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: But I am a lucky in that Bill and the board have been really good to me.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸運比爾和董事會都對我很寬待。

sentences.english: It means spending time helping a neighbor. It means leaving room for people to make mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 好客就是花時間幫助鄰舍，也是寬待那些犯錯的人。

sentences.english: Is it true that Canada has lax immigration policies for Koalas?
sentences.chinese: 加拿大移民政策特別寬待樹袋熊，式真的麼？

sentences.english: I hope life treats U kind.
Should not treat ourselves too lenient.
